bibl.title: The Evolution of the English Bible from Papyri to King James.
bibl.note: Non vidimus. - Provides a guided tour of the evolution of biblical text and images based on rare materials in the Special Collections Library of the University of Michigan (including 13 papyri).
bibl.seg: BEAM Kathryn L. and Traianos GAGOS (Edd.), The Evolution of the English Bible from Papyri to King James.
Ann Arbor, The University of Michigan Press, 1997, CD-ROM et 1 brochure, 152 pp. ISBN 0-472-99249-X. $59.95.
Non vidimus. - Provides a guided tour of the evolution of biblical text and images based on rare materials in the Special Collections Library of the University of Michigan (including 13 papyri).
C.R. par J.K. Elliott, NT 42 (2000) pp. 411-412.
